TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_akaway, title = akaway, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/akaway} }

S.FORM: akaway (kamu nu Hulam: ) u akaway atu lamit ku tusaay a siiyuay i kilang atu lutuk. i pabaw nu akaway ku papah, i sasa nu akaway ku lamit. namahiza naayaw u akaway adada' aca i kilang atu lutuk. masumad tu ku sakasipapah atu sakasilamit.
